attributes.action: bring Simon Burke home from Peru where he is currently held in a legal limbo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Simon visited Peru with a friend, Sarah Jackson, who unknown to him was allegedly planning to smuggle 10 kilos of cocaine back to the UK. They were both arrested and jailed but Simon was later released when Sarah admitted he had known nothing about the drugs.Simon is now unable to return home as his passport has been confiscated and is waiting for the slow legal process in Peru to complete. We want the British government to intervene and bring Simon home.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office/Foreign Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
